item.title: Live Updates: Over 200 Dead in Air India Crash, Official Says
item.description: The London-bound Boeing Dreamliner went down moments after takeoff in Ahmedabad, India, with 242 people aboard. It was unclear if anyone survived. The...

item.title: U.N. Watchdog Rules That Iran Is Not Complying With Nuclear Obligations
item.description: The decision comes as officials say they believe that Israel is preparing to launch a military attack on Iran. Tehran condemned the vote.

item.title: Photos and Video From the Scene of the Deadly Air India Crash
item.description: A passenger flight traveling from Ahmedabad, a city in western India, to London crashed shortly after takeoff.

item.title: Chaos At Site of Air India Plane Crash
item.description: Firefighters raced to douse smoking buildings as emergency workers recovered bodies after a deadly passenger plane crash in India.

item.title: Why Israel May Be Considering an Attack on Iran
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has vowed to prevent Tehran, “one way or the other,” from building a nuclear bomb.
